title: How Chris Watts Went From Family Man To Family Killer
description:
My special guest tonight is author Lena Derhally who here to discuss her new book about the murder of an entire family that is almost identical to the Scott Peterson case.
My Daddy is a Hero, How Chris Watts Went from Family Man to Family Killer
In this, the first and only psychological exploration of the Watts family murders, psychotherapist Lena Derhally has pieced together the crime, the events leading to it, and most of all, her beliefs about the question we are all still asking. Why?
Included is an in-depth look at community psychopaths, the different subtypes of narcissism, and interviews with a neuroscientist, a criminal psychologist, and a journalist in order to determine what in Chris Watts twisted makeup allowed him to hide who he really is for so long.
Get her book!

Enjoy the AD-FREE versions of our latest episodes and our archives right now from anywhere in the world.



Vist her website: http://www.LenaDerhally.com


Subscribe to K-Town's other podcasts!

Seven - Our podcast for the jaded ones that need wicked stories in their lives!


Super Fans can get all 3 of K-Town's podcasts without the ads?http://www.patreon.com/mysteriousradio to enjoy all of them "AD-FREE" right now!

Follow our other podcast Bizarre Times 
Visit our website: https://www.bizarretimespodcast.com
